pageTitle: Epson Graphics Printer, Stylus Pro, 4880 - Perfect Colours
textBeforeTable: Printer Supplies Printer Specification Low cost of ownership The wide colour gamut from Epson’s 8 colour Ultrachrome K3 ink set combined with large, individual print cartridges means you get optimum ink usage and a lower cost of ownership. High productivity Intuitive controls make for easy set-up and operation. High capacity ink cartridges mean less changes and higher throughput – ideal for fast turnarounds or overnight printing. Great results across a wide range of media Choose from ultra smooth fine art paper, matte finish, gloss finish or even rigid poster board for high quality cut sheet output. You can even produce 4 x 6 inch / 10 x 15 cm prints. Amazing detail, smoothness and definition With Epson you’ll enjoy a consistently high standard of detail. The print head features micro-fine nozzles that place uniformly shaped, variable sized ink droplets on the media for incredibly sharp, grain-free images. Innovative image processing improves print quality at all resolutions. Images are reproduced consistently – even across different printers – in vivid, long-lasting colour. Epson UltraChrome K3 ink with Vivid Magenta delivers stunning, photo-realistic image quality. The 8 colour inkset has the widest possible gamut for a fantastic range of expression, and you’ll see subtle shadows and highlights when printing in black and white. A breakthrough in professional imaging Bring new realism to photography, fine art and proofing. Push the limits of photo-quality printing with the Stylus Pro 4880 – an A2+/17″ printer that delivers superb,
